title: Bonus Episode - Active Duty SF Officer "Nate" talks toxic leadership, training, and building trust
description:
While we wait for Season 2 to kick off, we’re releasing a BONUS episode!

SOFcast host SGM Matt Parrish talks with his former team leader and Active Duty SF Officer “Nate” about their time working together. What does it take to lead a team of diverse experiences and personalities? What’s the right way to think of training? How do you build trust?

All that and more on this BONUS episode of SOFcast!

Subscribe today and leave us a review!
itunes:author: US Special Operations Command
